channel.title: Comments on: Nary a cloth shall confine me! (and other feats of strength)
channel.description: tales in the life of Madeline Ann Downey

item.title: By: Smitten Gramma Laurie
item.dc:creator: Smitten Gramma Laurie
item.description: How is it possible that lil' darling Maddie continues to get even more huggable, lovable, & oh so adorable????!!!!????!!!!
item.content:encoded: How is it possible that lil’ darling Maddie continues to get even more huggable, lovable, & oh so adorable????!!!!????!!!!
